name: Armadillo Bakery
description:
Play as a sleepy armadillo who runs a pie bakery! Deliver pies to your rabbit friends, but make sure to get their orders right. You might start out a little slow, so drink plenty of coffee to get yourself going. 

This game uses these sounds from freesound:

"FX_Squirt" by PeteBarry licensed under CCBY 4.0

"Buzzer sounds (Wrong answer/Error)" by Breviceps licensed under CC0 1.0

"Correct" by LittleRainySeasons licensed under CC0 1.0

"63-Sip of Coffee" by Leoctiurs licensed under CCBY 3.0
